price: 82. Dan iedereen die zich hierna hiervan afkeert, zij zijn de verdorvenen.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
